trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Amherst
There were no other sightings in Amherst on or around July 31st 1966
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I were looking out the bedroom window and saw a distant red lightzip left then right across the eastern sky. it then zipped left again and washovering above our house. We got our parents who were in the back of the house,I went out the front door, my father looked up out the front door I looked up atit, and ran into the house. I stood in about the center of the house, and hearda wiring soung like a washing machine on spin cycle. After a few minutes it wasgone. I felt very alone. No one else remembered this event after. The year I amnot certian about it was between 1964 and 1968 I remember school would start ina week or two, so it had to be late August.
Summary: A saucer I had seen as a child
